mapper.insert: insert into account_book values( concat('ab-', seq_account_book_no.nextval), #{id}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{regDate}, #{incomeExpense}, #{payment}, #{category} )
mapper.update: update account_book set detail = #{detail}, price = #{price}, reg_date = #{regDate}, income_expense = #{incomeExpense}, payment = #{payment}, category = #{category} where code = #{code} and id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from account_book where id = #{id} order by reg_date desc
select * from account_book where id = #{id} and code = #{code}

select * from ( select nvl(income_expense, 0) as income_expense, sum(price) as total from ( select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 0), 'yyyy-mm') ) where id = #{id} group by income_expense )

select sum(plus_minus) from ( select case when income_expense = 'E' then price * -1 when income_expense ='I' then price * 1 end as plus_minus from ( select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 0), 'yyyy-mm') and id = #{id} order by reg_date desc ) )
select * from account_book where id=#{id} and reg_date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by reg_date desc

select sum(price) as total, category from (select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, 0), 'yyyy-mm') and id = #{id} and income_expense = #{incomeExpense} ) group by category

select monthly, nvl(sum(case when income_expense='I' then price end), 0) as income, nvl(sum(case when income_expense='E' then price end), 0) as expense from ( select to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm') as monthly, price, income_expense from account_book where id=#{id} ) group by monthly order by monthly
select sum(price) as sum, count(*) as count from ( select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, #{monthly}), 'mm') and id = #{id} )

select * from (select category, count(category) as count, sum(price) as sum from (select to_char(add_months(sysdate, #{monthly}), 'yyyy-mm') as monthly, category, price from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, #{monthly}), 'yyyy-mm') and id = #{id} and income_expense= #{incomeExpense} ) group by monthly, category) where rownum <= 3 order by sum desc

select nvl(payment, 'blank') as payment, count(payment) as count from ( select payment from account_book where id=#{id} and to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(add_months(sysdate, #{monthly}), 'yyyy-mm') and income_expense = #{incomeExpense} ) group by payment
